select bu.*, br.id as roleId, br.role_name as roleName from b_user bu left join b_userrole bur on bur.user_id = bu.id and bur.is_deleted = 0 left join b_role br on br.id = bur.role_id and br.is_deleted = 0 where bu.is_deleted = 0
and username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and real_name like concat('%',#{realName},'%')
order by gmt_create DESC
select bur.* from b_userrole bur inner join b_role br on br.id = bur.role_id where bur.is_deleted = 0 and (br.role_code = #{roleAdmin} or br.role_code = #{roleMananger})
